main event: An irregular shaped object, described as the size of a grapefruit and of bright steel bluish color, was observed at a very high altitude, moving from west to east over New York, N.Y. It was seen for 30 seconds and was reported by a civilian source in an area with heavy air traffic.
interesting points: The UFO was irregular shaped, described as the size of a grapefruit, and had a bright steel bluish color.
It was observed at a very high altitude and moved from west to east in a straight course overhead.
The sighting took place in an area with heavy air traffic, leading to the conclusion that it was probably one of numerous aircraft flying over the New York area.
The observation lasted for 30 seconds and was reported by a civilian source.
The report indicates clear weather conditions and provides detailed wind speed and direction at different altitudes.
sighted object: Irregular shaped object, size of a grapefruit, bright steel bluish color
